zh.title: 如何在 Shift at Midnight 的午夜班防范幽灵分身：新手指南

en.title: How to Identify Doppelgangers in Shift at Midnight: A Complete Beginner's Guide
en.description: This article provides a complete survival and strategy guide for new players in Shift at Midnight, focusing on identifying doppelgangers through questioning, barricades, traps, and coordination.

zh.title: Shift at Midnight 联机合作秘籍：夜班生存战术详解
zh.description: 本文详解 Shift at Midnight 中 1–3 人联机合作策略，包括角色分工、沟通技巧、资源分配及突发事件应对，助你高效度过每场午夜班。

en.title: Shift at Midnight Co‑op Survival Guide: 1–3 Player Strategies for the Night Shift
en.description: This article dives into co‑op teamwork strategies in Shift at Midnight for 1–3 players, covering role assignments, communication techniques, resource management, and handling unexpected threats.

zh.title: Shift at Midnight 机制评测：深度解析随机事件与重玩价值
zh.description: 本文深入评测 Shift at Midnight 的核心机制，分析其 roguelike 随机事件系统、难度平衡与高度重玩价值，为玩家提供实用策略和理解游戏设计逻辑。

en.title: Shift at Midnight Mechanics Review: Analyzing Random Events and Replay Value
en.description: This article provides an in-depth review of Shift at Midnight's core mechanics, analyzing its roguelike random event system, difficulty balance, and high replay value, offering practical strategies and insight into game design.

zh.title: Shift at Midnight 下载指南：安装、启动与更新方法详解

en.title: Shift at Midnight Download Guide: How to Install, Launch, and Update the Game
en.description: This article walks you through the full process of downloading and installing Shift at Midnight, including platform options, system requirements, setup instructions, troubleshooting, and update tips—perfect for first-time players.

en.title: Shift at Midnight Game Guide: Complete Walkthrough and Survival Tips for Beginners
